name: Witch Roastery & Cafe
description:
You are a witch barista who lives in the woods!  Talk with animals, brew interesting potion drinks, and manage your customers' moods over the course of one busy day.

FEATURES

  • Speak to customers and learn about their problems
  • Brew drinks that affect their mood
  • Full tutorial
  • Choose from a plethora of different dialogue options

Witch Roastery & Cafe is a point-and-click narrative and crafting game.  It's about fifteen minutes in length. 

CREDITS

Game Design & Creation: Livia (me!) and Mei Zhang

Music: Ricky Matute rickymatute.com

Some SFX: Mallow Chu
